1.verse: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timothy, unto the church of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace to you and peace.
For yourselves, brethren, know our entering in unto you, that it hath not been found vain:
Wherefore when we could no longer forbear, we thought it good to be left behind at Athens alone;
Finally then, brethren, we beseech and exhort you in the Lord Jesus, that, as ye received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God, even as ye do walk,â€”that ye abound more and more.
But concerning the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that aught be written unto you.
